abstrac: I'm a dynamic performance marketing expert with a proven history of managing campaigns to exceed client expectations! Search Engine Marketing, SEO, Facebook & Programmatic Display and Video
bio:
I am dynamic online marketing professional specializing in Search and Programmatic Display and Video advertising. I have a proven history of effectively manage campaigns to exceed client expectations while balancing competing key performance indicators (fulfillment, CTR, CPC, CPM, Viewability & Conversion metrics).

I am also skilled in WordPress web development, landing page design and implementation, social media marketing, email marketing, search engine optimization and content production, and Google Analytics setup and troubleshooting.

While in college, I co-founded CollegeRecipes.com, an educational resource for college students learning to cook. After college I was hired in a production role at a multi-entity national financial consulting corporation. Following my passions, I self-initiated marketing responsibilities and ultimately managed the company's online marketing including their SEM & SEO efforts. I also conceived of and independently developed a new online business for the company, DIYReserveStudy.com

Double Major B.A. in Economics & Political Science, Pepperdine University (April, 2013)

Specialties:
• Search Engine Marketing (SEM) - Google AdWords Certified, Bing Ads Accredited
• Programmatic Video and Display Advertising - DoubleClick, TubeMogul, TheTradeDesk, Drawbridge
• Social Media Marketing - Facebook, Twitter; paid and earned
• Email Marketing
• Web Analytics - Google Analytics Academy Certified
• WordPress web development - CollegeRecipes.com, DIYReserveStudy.com & others
• Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
• Content development & team management
• Software & web testing

I'm fast, flexible and friendly! I'm available on Skype during and often after office hours, respond quickly to emails and am happy to schedule a call anytime.

I'm happy to accept payment via Guru or PayPal. For continuing engagements, I will gladly provide necessary tax information in order to be 1099'ed!
